amendment.description: To require an annual report on the allocation of funding within the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the Department of the Treasury.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3768 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3768 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S10251-10252; text: CR S10251; text as modified: CR S10251-10252) To require an annual report on the allocation of funding within the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the Department of the Treasury.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3768 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3768 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Baucus.
